meanings.definition: excitors: a person or thing that excites or stimulates
meanings.sent1: The excitors at the amusement park made everyone laugh and have fun.
meanings.sent2: The excitors in the movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent3: The excitors, a playful puppy, chased its tail in circles around the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her contagious laughter acted as an excitors, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The excitors, colorful balloons, floated gracefully in the sky, capturing everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The excitors music at the party got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: The excitors atmosphere of the festival filled the air with energy.
meanings.sent3: The excitors colors of the painting seemed to dance on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: The excitors news of the surprise party spread quickly among friends.
meanings.sent5: The excitors fireworks lit up the night sky with bursts of color and sound.
